parent_formation: No. 232 Wing, HQ Western Desert, RAF Middle East

operations_history.operation: Second Battle of El Alamein - Opening
Second Battle of El Alamein - Breakthrough Phase

sources: historyofwar.org - No. 223 Squadron (RAF) during the Second World War (TIER 2)
National Archives UK - AIR 27 series (referenced but not accessed - TIER 1 unavailable)
metadata.notes: HYBRID VALIDATION: Wikipedia used for initial identification. Tier 2 sources (historyofwar.org, MilitaryFactory) provided squadron history, base locations, parent formation, and aircraft specifications. Tier 1 sources (RAF ORBs AIR 27 series) exist at National Archives but not digitally accessible. Estimated 40-50% Tier 1/2 validation = TIER 3. Personnel numbers estimated from typical RAF light bomber squadron establishment 1942. No specific commander name found in available sources. Operational sortie/loss data not available without ORB access. Aircraft variant mix (Mk III/IIIA) confirmed for June 1942-Oct 1943 timeframe. Base location Amriya confirmed Sept 1942-March 1943. Assignment to 232 Wing confirmed 27 Oct 1942.
